fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose 2 people each night to Rainbowmail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you Rainbowmail a target, you will assign them a color of your choice, Rainbowmailed targets will get access to a private chat with anyone of the same color.
- Each player may only have 1 Rainbowmail color at any time, If you use your ability on a Rainbowmailed player it will change their color.

- You may assign yourself a color once per night.
- You may also assign no color to your target, Removing their Rainbowmail color.
